articles.author: Pete Muntean
articles.title: Airlines suspend workers for posts about shooting of Charlie Kirk - CNN
articles.description: Both Delta Air Lines and American Airlines say they have suspended workers for social media posts about last week’s fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk.
articles.content:
Both Delta Air Lines and American Airlines say they have suspended workers for social media posts about last weeks fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk.
We were made aware of Delta employees whose social … [+1328 chars]
